code: import React from'react';import{useAuth}from'../hooks/useAuth';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const{login}=useAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async()=>{try{await login('test-token');navigate('/');}catch(error){console.error('Login failed:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-md w-full bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center mb-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900",children:"Production System"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-2 text-gray-600",children:"Please scan your ID to continue"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,className:"w-full flex justify-center py-3 px-4 border border-transparent  rounded-md shadow-sm text-sm font-medium text-white  bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 focus:outline-none  focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-blue-500",children:"Login with ID Card"})})]})});};export default LoginPage;
